author: USA TODAY, Veronica Bravo, Janet Loehrke and Karina Bland, USA TODAY
title: How to make your own face mask to help stop the spread of the coronavirus
description: The CDC recommends you cover your mouth to protect yourself and others from the coronavirus. Here's a pattern and instructions to make a face mask.
content:
It's difficult to keep your distance in a grocery store or pharmacy, so now the CDC says we should wear a homemade mask in public to slow the spread of the coronavirus  particularly in areas with high community transmission.
Officials don't want healthy peop… [+2450 chars]
